title: MD
biography: Rakesh Bedi is an Indian film, stage and television actor. He is known for his iconic comic roles in films such as Chashme Buddoor (1981) and Mera Damad (1985). In 2025, he was widely praised for his dramatic role in Dhurandhar. He has also appeared in television shows like Yeh Jo Hai Zindagi (1984), Shrimaan Shrimati (1994–1997), Yes Boss (1999–2009), Bhabhi Ji Ghar Par Hain (2015–present), and Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah (2020–present).
aiSummary: Rakesh K. Srivastava is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 67 at Translational oncology (Member). Has been published in Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Cell Cycle, Molecular and Cellular Biochemistry. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
